DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of low-dose interferon-alfa-2b plus ribavirin compared to the standard-dose of the same combination in patients with chronic hepatitis C.
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Trial of Standard Versus Low-dose Peg-Interferon Plus Ribavirin in the Treatment of Chronic Hepatitis C
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of Chronic Hepatitis C. Must be infected with genotype 1b viruses Hemoglobin levels<8.5g/dL, Platelet counts<50,000/mm3, Total polymorphonuclear counts<1000/mm3 Pregnancy, Renal dysfunction,
